issue.title: What is the structure of the final?

content.raw:
If this is suppose to simulate a Mars mission then I would think that Val will be using ROS to complete the mission and transmit telemetry data back to the command computer. The time lag will be significant anyway
and you may not be able complete the tasks if your strategy is to rely on teleoperation alone.

As Dan would be the expert on this subject, issues that might arise in a space mission would be simulated back on Earth and new instructions would be transmitted to the vehicle.
content.html:
If this is suppose to simulate a Mars mission then I would think that Val will be using ROS to complete the mission and transmit telemetry data back to the command computer. The time lag will be significant anyway and you may not be able complete the tasks if your strategy is to rely on teleoperation alone.

As Dan would be the expert on this subject, issues that might arise in a space mission would be simulated back on Earth and new instructions would be transmitted to the vehicle.
